sentences.en: 'You do me too much honour,'said the Marquis;'still, I prefer that supposition.'
sentences.cn: “ 你给了我太大的荣幸, ” 候爵说, “ 可我仍然坚持我刚才的假定. ”

sentences.en: FW: Supposition always plays a great role in people's perception.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克-威廉姆斯: 推测总是在人们的感觉中扮演了重要的角色.

sentences.en: His theory is merely based on supposition.
sentences.cn: 他的理论只是根据推测而提出的.

sentences.en: His version of events is pure supposition .
sentences.cn: 他对事情的说法纯属推测。

sentences.en: His version of the events is pure supposition.
sentences.cn: 他对这件事的说法纯属猜测.

sentences.en: I was acting on the supposition that what he told me was true.
sentences.cn: 我假定他所告诉我的是真的才采取行动.

sentences.en: Probably his wild gesticulations and his generally excited and rebellious manner gave rise to this supposition.
sentences.cn: 大概是他那种粗野的手势以及经常激动和不信邪的态度使人家产生了这种怀疑.

sentences.en: That is a very likely supposition.
sentences.cn: 那是一种很有可能成立的假设.

sentences.en: The police are acting on the supposition that she took the money.
sentences.cn: 警察正按照她偷了钱的猜想采取行动.

sentences.en: The police are working on the supposition that he was murdered.
sentences.cn: 警方正根据他被谋杀的假定展开调查。

sentences.en: The positions of the two lines are consistent with this supposition.
sentences.cn: 两条线的位置是这种假定相符的.

sentences.en: The report has been rejected by the authorities, who said much of it was based on supposition or inaccuracy.
sentences.cn: 当局驳回了该报告，称其许多内容有的纯属臆测，有的存在偏差错误。

sentences.en: The story is based on supposition.
sentences.cn: 这故事是以假想为基础的.

sentences.en: There's a popular supposition that we're publicly funded but the bulk of our money comes from competitive contracts.
sentences.cn: 人们普遍认为我们是受公共基金的资助，然而我们大部分资金是通过签订竞争性合同得来的。

sentences.en: This newspaper article is based on supposition, not on fact.
sentences.cn: 报纸上的这篇文章是根据推想, 而不是事实.

sentences.en: Well, it really is but a shadowy supposition.
sentences.cn: 呃, 其实这不过是一种望风捉影的悬想.

words.tran_cn: 假定的；被信以为真的；想象上的
假设；认为；让（虚拟语气）；推想

trans.tran_cn: 猜测， 推测，假定，猜想
trans.tran_en: something that you think is true, even though you are not certain and cannot prove it
